entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
